title: Anyone going to miss Star Guardian Invasion Onslaught?
body:
I understand it's probably not going to happen, but after all the days of completing missions for Invasion, I really grew attached to the game mode, and want it to continue even after the Star Guardian event missions end. Onslaught really requires team work and players to know how to work together in an overwhelming environment, but I guess challenges for PVE game modes are somewhat limited (only a few stages with the same AIs, and will eventually be unchallenging with strategies.), so it is reasonable to remove it after a period of time.I'm still a new player so I don't know if there's been any other great temporary game modes before this one, but anyone feel the same way?

Was there a game mode for the burning bright release? and what do you guys think about these game modes in general?
